caption: Yesterday was our first time we came to that excellent restaurant. But It is no doubt not the last. We passed a splendid evening with the generous service, with the first-rate  meal and fine drinks and with the honest cost. We will definitely visit there in a short time.
I love this venue very much. theres a romantic spirit. The kitcen is good. the service is effective and the personel is polite. The pay is modest. deeply recommend.
Certainly a place worth trying, the food is fantastic and fresh, the costs are reasonable and it is constantly well kept in here. Fantastic work.
Had a awesome experience in this spot with my daughter. The food arrived rapidly and the service is just good. Prices are convenient.
This place knows how to treat their customers. Always with a very friendly demeanor. The food is fairly priced, regularly yummy and clean.

First and foremost I dine out extremely often. What I love is what I felt and was given today from STEVE. The absolute best. Represents Brooklyn steaks and lobster house very well. From the moment I walked in I was skeptical because of past experiences w steak as I said I dine out a lot . Steve was perfect. There are no better words. From the food to the experience he gave . Genuine. Unforced. The man came to work to make ppl like me day. I am very impressed. Thanks Steve. Free mask and a lovely tip every time gotta bring my friends

This spot is my favorite. I eat in a lot of restaurants but to this place I keep coming back again and again. The stuff is very affectionate and the food they cook is so yummy. I never decline to have a decent dinner here. Highly recommended.

I often take my friends to this place with my warmest recommendations. I visit this restaurant often. I get very good feedback from my friends. The the food there is flavorable and the team is attentive and cooperative. Every time  we go to this place we pass a lovely evening.  I recommend this place with pleasure.

(Translated by Google) I ordered a $ 30 steak for my wallet. I asked for a medium rare, but it came out as a medium. The meat was cold. I was expecting the garlic rice which was popular in the reviews, but the chopped garlic was almost raw and hot! The garlic taste was too strong and the steak was ruined. The steak sauce is salty. It might be good for those who want to eat an American steak, but there is no second time ...  (Original) お財布の事情で３０ドルのステーキを注文。ミディアムレアで頼んだけどミディアムくらいで出てきた。肉は冷めていた。レビューで好評だったガーリックライスに期待していたけど、みじん切りされたガーリックがほぼ生で辛かった!ガーリック味が強すぎてステーキが台無し。ステーキソースは塩辛い。アメリカンなステーキが食べたい方にはいいかもだけど、二度目はないわ…。

I almost cried when the food was gone. Even the butter sauce for the lobster was so good I dipped the garnish in it after I finished the lobster just so it wouldn't go to waste. The steak had the most delicious char without compromising its juicy tenderness. The flavor was absurd. Angels sang. Fairies sprinkled the food with magic. The service was amazing.The chef was friendly and funny. What more do you want? Go here.

Brooklyn steak & lobster is THE BOMB. Our proprietor, Steve, was friendly and talked us through the making of the most amazing steak ever.  The steak - half wagyu/half rib eye, if you can believe - was wonderfully buttery and flavorful. Competing for gastronomical stardom was the garlic rice. Wowser!  It's tucked away in the corner of Japan Village by the sushi restaurant.  Run, don't walk.
The food was seasoned perfectly !! Literally the best steak & pork chop I've ever tasted .. The service was great and fast .. The chef was friendly and funny and cooked the food spectacular
Not a butcher shop but a proper steak restaurant

Let me tell you guys something...  If you want what might quite possibly be the best bang for your buck, mouthwatering, awesome experience in Industry City...its here. The food is nothing short of phenomenal, made by an experienced chef, right in front of you. I found this place just roaming around with some friends. The lunch was so good, I called my wife and told her to get the kid ready, because I'm bringing them back for dinner! Dinner was equally as awesome. I have absolutely no complaints. Nor did my family. The service was perfect. The people who service the tables are polite and all about the customers comfort. 5 stars. Will dine there again.

Great food! Pics don’t do it justice. Got the steak with garlic rice and omg yes the rice is amazing. We chatted with the chef and he knows his stuff. Next time I pass by I’ll get the Wagyu. Recommended for sure... it’s affordable too. My entire meal was $13.
Amazing food, lovely service. The portions are huge! Get the omurice and the washugyu, the garlic rice is bomb af.
